name: Where Is The Manual?!
description:
A Game Made In 48(+ A little bit - we were late!) Hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. We had problems exporting the game and so it was submitted to the late jam!

In this game, you get total control - and 0 instructions.

You wake up in an unfamiliar room. In front of you is a weird, alien looking control desk, and a screen. As you get closer to the desk, you realize you weren't looking at a screen - You are looking at a window. 

How are you going to get back home, And how in the world do you operate this thing?

Controls - Only the mouse.
